info.name: TalkingPointsMemo.com Clean-up
info.description: This is updated for the July 2007 TPM re-design.  It's a bit more sporting, in that the news and ads aren't suppressed but rather moved to page bottom.  Otherwise it's got the posts at full width and a font-size increase.

data.title: Thank you.  I love Josh, but I've hated reading hi
